summary: My attempt to give Shadowmere true dark and still realistic appearance. Cuz vanilla looked like Whiterun horse, and was boring brown
descriptionHtml:
First of all : I discovered that Shadowmere has his own model, but developers didn\'t bothered themselves to give him an unique texture. 
Second : I always wondered why did they give him that ugly red gloss on his fur so I edited a model a bit to give Shadowmere nice silver shining. It isn\'t bright and too noticeable.
Third : I didn\'t want to give him some mad colors, so I tried to make him look realistic.

So there we go ! Rate and comment, If you like It... Or not, It you don\'t)
author: Rainkitty
